title: [Ta'Illistim, Sylvar Wey]
description: The wey rounds a sharp bend, the smooth-worn cobbled stones gleaming in hues of grey and steely blue.  Neatly kept cottages, each surrounded by hydrangea bushes in pale shades of blue and rose, line the edge of the wey in tidy rows.  Here and there, a window glows yellow in the darkness.

The wey rounds a sharp bend, the smooth-worn cobbled stones gleaming in hues of grey and steely blue.  Neatly kept cottages, each surrounded by hydrangea bushes in pale shades of blue and rose, line the edge of the wey in tidy rows.

The wey rounds a sharp bend, the smooth-worn cobbledstones gleaming in hues of grey and steely blue.  Neatly kept houses, each surrounded by rose bushes in shades of white and red, line the edge of the wey in tidy rows.  Here and there, a window glows blue in the darkness.

The wey rounds a sharp bend, the smooth-worn cobbledstones gleaming in hues of grey and steely blue.  Neatly kept houses, each surrounded by rose bushes in shades of white and red, line the edge of the wey in tidy rows.
